content: this christmas tree and star crochet garland will have your home ready for christmas in no time fast and easy to make the 2d style pieces two flat panels stuffed and joined together can be made into a garland for a festive addition to your fireplace used as place setting decor or strung individually to use as ornaments visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for the pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions and step-by-step pictures - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level easy - level 2 -this pattern is beginner-friendly but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading sizing each tree measures about 6 tall and each star is about 3 tall finished garland as written measures about 6 share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #treeandstargarland hashtag to show off your new project copyright the christmas tree and star crochet garland pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
